channel.title: Blood Shed's Error Help Thread!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u71/ffkoc/cooltext57982452.gif[/img] [center][IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u71/ffkoc/cooltext57989761.gif[/img][/center] [right][IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u71/ffkoc/cooltext57989910.jpg[/img][/right]
[size=18pt][b]Ok Everyone! It is here!!!! Blood Shed's Error Help Thread! If you have Errors, Post them here!!![/b][/size]
If you can help people with their errors, please do so! I'm not the best coder, thus, I won't be able to solve all errors!
[b]Thread Rules:[/b] No Spamming. No Flaming. No Useless Posts. Try to use proper grammer, and the formats.
My Status: :D
[b]Key:[/b] :D [b]= Here For Sure[/b] :) [b]= Here On and Off[/b] :( [b]= Not On[/b]
Here is a format on things:
Error Reporting:
[code] How Many Errors: What Were You Trying To Add: Pice Of Text Of What You Were Adding: Your Errors: {MAKE THE ERRORS IN CODE FORMAT}[/code]
If you wish to help someone fix an error use this:
[code] Hey ____________, I think I found the answer to your error.
Put a Quote Of The Error Here _____________________________________Answer Here_________________________________________________________________________[/code]
Now Here is a list of the most common errors:
None Yet :eek:

item.title: Blood Shed's Error Help Thread!
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Shed Blood Shed
item.description:
@Blood_Shed wrote:


[center][/center]
[right][/right]

[size=18pt]Ok Everyone! It is here!!! Blood Shed’s Error Help Thread! If you have Errors, Post them here!!![/size]

If you can help people with their errors, please do so! I’m not the best coder, thus, I won’t be able to solve all errors!

Thread Rules:
No Spamming.
No Flaming.
No Useless Posts.
Try to use proper grammer, and the formats.

My Status:

Key:
= Here For Sure
= Here On and Off
= Not On

Here is a format on things:

Error Reporting:

How Many Errors: What Were You Trying To Add: Pice Of Text Of What You Were Adding: Your Errors: {MAKE THE ERRORS IN CODE FORMAT}

If you wish to help someone fix an error use this:

[code]
Hey ____________,
I think I found the answer to your error.

Put a Quote Of The Error Here
Answer Here____________________________________[/code]

Now Here is a list of the most common errors:
